notes: Meier was not on the ice on Tuesday (Nov. 19) while suffering from back spasms, Amanda Stein of the Devils' official site reports.

Nurse is expected to be out for about 5-10 days, per Kenzie Lalonde of TSN on Monday.

Mantha will require surgery on his ACL and will miss the remainder of the 2024-25 season.

Pelech will begin skating as soon as they've been cleared by doctors, but no timeline has been established.

Barzal will begin skating as soon as they've been cleared by doctors, but no timeline has been established.
Mike Reilly will have a procedure on his heart tomorrow. He will be out indefinitely. He has been cleared from his concussion.

Anthony Duclair has not resumed skating yet, but Lamoriello said the team hopes he'll begin skating in the near future. Duclair has been out with a lower-body injury since Oct. 19.
